about_the_game:
Survive
The main goal will be survival, for this you need to repair the broken airplane using the infrastructure saved for the winter period.

Overcome
One of the core mechanics of the game is overcoming obstacles using a tool that the player has to find or craft.

Harsh conditions
The dynamic change of day, the variety of weather conditions is not just visual noise, but an important mechanic affecting character indicators and the perception of the game world.

Wild Animals
The ecosystem of the taiga, randomly generates events for the player. The animals are dangerous in their own way and require a certain approach.

Adapt
Heroes from improvised materials build their everyday life - create tools, weapons and traps for hunting and scaring off predators, build temporary shelters.

Victory
In The White Prison, the main antagonist is represented by man, in confrontation with whom the tragic contrast that there is no beast more terrible than man is revealed.

content_descriptors.notes: Эта игра может содержать контент, не подходящий для всех возрастов или для просмотра на работе: Сцены насилия или жестокости, Контент для взрослых, Неявные сцены наготы.

short_description: The White Prison is a tragic and thrilling story about the confrontation of indigenous peoples, the impending civilization, told through the prism of a survival simulator. Take the role of polar aviation pilots who made an emergency landing in the Siberian taiga and try to survive.
